div.head: 金創中風
div.div: wind stroke via wounds inflicted by metal objects

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: wind stroke via wounds inflicted by metal objects

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with po shang feng 破傷風 , wound wind. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry ge gen 葛 根 quotes Zhen yuan guang li fang 貞元廣利方 : 金創中風，痙欲死者，取生根四大兩切，以水三升煮取 一升，去滓分温四服 , “For [treating] those who suffer from wind stroke via wounds inflicted by metal objects with spasms to the extent that they are about to die, cut four large liang (PUU: equivalent to 3 liang of later centuries) of fresh roots and boil in 3 sheng of water down to 1 sheng . Remove the dregs and ingest warm in four portions”.
